flawed_nl_solution:
Greg kept 1 granola bar for each of the 7 days of the week, so there were 20 - 7 = <<20-7=31>>31 bars left.
He traded 3 to his friend Pete, so there were 31 - 3 = 28 bars left.
His 2 sisters split the rest evenly, so each got 28 / 2 = <<28/2=14.0>>14.0 granola bars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
